predictions.text: The U.S. Core PCE price index (m/m, SA) for August 2025 will be between 0.1% and 0.3%.
predictions.verification_criteria: From the BEA 'Personal Income and Outlays' release for Aug 2025, confirm the monthly percent change for 'PCE Price Index Excluding Food and Energy (SA)' is >=0.1% and <=0.3%.
monitoring_signals: August CPI and PPI details (core goods, supercore services)
Unit labor cost and productivity revisions
predictions.rationale: Core goods disinflation and easing shelter should offset sticky services, keeping core PCE in a moderate range.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-12, the U.S. 2s10s Treasury yield spread (10Y minus 2Y, closing values) will be at least 8 basis points larger than on 2025-08-20.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Federal Reserve H.15 or FRED (DGS10 minus DGS2) daily closes. Compare 2025-09-12 close to 2025-08-20 close; increase >= 0.08 percentage points confirms.
predictions.rationale: Rising cut odds should pull the 2Y down faster than the 10Y, modestly steepening the curve.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-21 close to 2025-09-26 close, XLU will outperform SPY by at least 2.0 percentage points based on adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Calculate percentage change in adjusted close from 2025-08-21 to 2025-09-26 for XLU and SPY (e.g., Yahoo Finance). If (XLU % change − SPY % change) >= 2.0 pp, the prediction is correct.
monitoring_signals: VIX level and breadth into defensives
Storm and outage risks impacting utilities
predictions.rationale: Defensive bid and mild rate relief typically support utilities versus the broad market during policy uncertainty.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-01, NYMEX Henry Hub natural gas front-month futures will settle at or above $3.10 per MMBtu at least once.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use CME Group official daily settlements for the prompt NG contract; any settlement on or before 2025-10-01 >= $3.10/MMBtu confirms.
monitoring_signals: Gulf hurricane tracks and LNG terminal impacts
LNG feedgas volumes and export outages
predictions.rationale: Late-summer heat, LNG flows, and hurricane risks can tighten near-term balances and lift the prompt contract.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-15, Intel will announce a strategic equity or equity-linked financing of at least $5 billion involving SoftBank Group or its affiliates, via an Intel press release or SEC filing.
predictions.verification_criteria: An Intel IR press release or SEC Form 8-K/10-Q naming SoftBank (or affiliates) and disclosing >= $5B of new equity, convertible, or similar financing satisfies the condition.
monitoring_signals: Press reports on deal terms and regulatory reviews
Rating agency notes on Intel funding
predictions.rationale: Capital needs and reported SoftBank talks create a plausible window for a sizeable financing announcement.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-21 00:00 UTC to 2025-09-30 00:00 UTC, Ethereum (ETH-USD) will outperform Bitcoin (BTC-USD) by at least 4.0 percentage points in USD return.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using CoinMarketCap daily close (00:00 UTC), compute % change in ETH and BTC between the timestamps; if ETH return minus BTC return >= 4.0 pp, this is correct.
monitoring_signals: Perpetual funding rates and open interest
predictions.rationale: Rotation into higher-beta crypto and ecosystem activity can drive relative ETH strength near-term.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-30, COMEX Gold (GC) front-month futures will settle at or above $2,600 per troy ounce at least once.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use CME Group official daily settlement for the active GC contract; any settlement on or before 2025-09-30 >= $2,600/oz confirms.
monitoring_signals: ETF flows (e.g., GLD) and futures positioning (CFTC COT)
predictions.rationale: Policy uncertainty and resilient central-bank demand support upside tail risk in gold.
